sections.summary: i have strong marketing, and sales skills, with a costumer service background combined with over 10 years of management. i am skilled with learning new concepts, i work well under pressure and communicate ideas clearly, and effectively. demonstrated achiever of being responsible, punctual, and consistent with all company policies.
